Description: The tribulations of St Antony; the saint is lifted into the air and tormented by demons; first state Engraving
Curator's comments: Copy in reverse after Schongauer. Lit.: E. Hauwaerts et al, 'Colard Mansion. Incunabula, Prints and Manuscripts in Medieval Bruges' (Bruges, 2018), cat. 48.
Bibliographic references: Lehrs 1908-34 / Geschichte und kritische Katalog des deutschen, niederländischen und französischen Kupferstichs im XV Jahrhundert (VII.146.40.I)
Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (40.I)
Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (54.e) (Copy after Schongauer)
TIB / The Illustrated Bartsch (0801.054.C5) (Copy after Schongauer)
Exhibition history: 2018 1 Mar-3 Jun, Belgium, Bruges, Groeningmuseum, Haute lecture. Colard Mansion and the Dawn of Printing
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
